input.sentences: in the woods | there was a broken tree .
there was some water by the rock .
output.sentences: Doing my daily walk in the fores and I decided to go a different path and look what I came across, a tree in the middle of a path, interesting.
As I proceed on with my journey I came across a bug that looks like it is doing some type of yoga!, I believe.
Continuing on with my journey I spotted a small waterfall to my left shoulder which looks like a very peaceful place to be.
As I look to my left, Oh look, I am not sure what these are but they look interesting.
I also saw some red dot which to me I believe it was some sort of bug!.
